Welcome to a guide to the COWRES HTTP API

One may use this html and plaintext example to learn the COWRES HTTP API. The intended users of the HTTP API are programs that request evaluations, which may be written in any language. For more information on how to set up WRES evaluation configurations as well as how to get help, please visit the project page or contact a WRES administrator for a link to your help pages.

If you are not writing a program to interact with the COWRES HTTP API, you may be looking for an instance of the WRES GUI at NWCAL which is at a separate URL. Please visit the project page or contact a WRES administrator for a link to your help pages.
